local_intent: ensure white_plate is visible, move above and perform ApproachAndAlign, verify grasp pose available
assumptions: Gripper is open and robot can move to above-target poses
No intervening obstacles block motion to white_plate
coherence_with_global: Realizes the 'approach' phase in the global plan: re-detect/perceive the white plate, move above it, perform ApproachAndAlign with the prescribed tolerance and timeout, and verify the computed grasp pose before pick.
